radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy and nodular pulmonary infiltrates within the right middle, left upper, and left lower lobes with associated mediastinal lymphadenopathy measuring up to 1.2 cm in diameter.
Multiple enhancing hypervascular lesions throughout the liver measuring up to 1.2 cm and a 2.3-cm heterogeneous mass with nodular enhancement in the right lobe of the liver.
